Address: SENTARA NORFOLK GENERAL HEART HOSPITAL PROJECT
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Description: McCarthy Building Companies agreed to pay $362,550 in settlement of alleged failure to implement a Storm Water Pollution Prevention Plan and discharge of storm water with eroded soils during construction of the Meridian III Solar Facility.

McCarthy Building Companies, Inc. and Essex Solar Center, LLC agreed to jointly pay $254,000 in settlement of allegations that stormwater discharges from the solar energy center did not conform to permits and violated state regulations concerning erosion, sediment and wetlands protection.
